Motorline Turbo Automatic Barrier
Turbo   Automatic BarrierEnsure efficient access control with the TURBO automatic barrier. Equipped with a 24Vdc brushless motor, this barrier provides speed, resistance and durability.
Complies with EN12453 standard

name: Motorline MPIE10 Stainless Steel Bollards
description:
The 304 stainless steel bollards with built-in RGB LEDs are particularly useful solutions in urban areas and allow vehicle access to reserved areas such as historic sites, municipal streets and private parking lots.
With high durability, the stainless steel bollards have a twilight sensor included to activate night presence light and are prepared to work 24 hours a day, every day.
MPIE10 – Automatic folding bollard
MPIE5 – Fixed bollard
The fixed bollard MPIE5 can be indicated to also be applied between two automatic bollards MPIE10.

name: Motorline Sigma XS5 Electromechanical Barrier
description:
Electromechanical barrier with galvanized steel structure and sablé lacquered aluminum outer coating. It integrates aluminum boom up to 5m with skirt, ideal for traffic control and crossing barriers.
Other features:
Built-in RGB flashing lamp
24Vdc motor for intensive use
Slowdown in opening and closing

name: Motorline Sigma X Electromechanical Barrier
description:
Electromechanical barrier in galvanized steel with an innovative boom application system, which allows changing the position of the barrier (left or right). This functionality makes management and customization even simpler and more efficient.
SIGMA X4 – With extendable boom from 2.5m to 4m
SIGMA X6 – With extendable boom from 3.5m to 6m
Other features:
Possibility of placing LEDs
Built-in twilight sensor
Built-in RGB flashing light
Possibility to apply batteries
24Vdc motor for intensive use
Slowdown in opening and closing

name: Motorline Sigma XA5 Electromechanical Barrier
description:
Electromechanical barrier with galvanized steel structure and sablé lacquered aluminum outer coating. It integrates articulated aluminum boom up to 5m = 2,5m + 2,5m, ideal for traffic control.
Other features:
Built-in RGB flashing lamp
24Vdc motor for intensive use
Slowdown in opening and closing

name: Motorline Automatic Chain Barrier
description:
Automatic chain barrier with two automated columns at 24Vdc for intensive use, made of resistant aluminum and lacquered in matt black (other RAL colors available).
Unlike other equivalent products on the market, both columns of the barrier are automated, with a built-in RGB flashing lamp that identifies the status of the maneuver. Ideal for road traffic control.
Other features:
Possibility of applying batteries for use in the event of an emergency
8m chain (∅8mm)
Transformer included
Aluminum lacquered safe

name: Motorline Zuma Electromechanical Barrier
description:
Electromechanical Barrier for Road ControlWith an innovative boom application system, which can be used both on the right and on the left, the ZUMA electromechanical barrier is an economical, versatile and resistant solution, which ensures boom access control.
It includes an extendable boom from 3.6 meters to 8 meters, which allows for even simpler and more efficient management and customization. Developed with a galvanized and lacquered steel box, it guarantees resistance against corrosion and can be a more economical alternative to the SIGMA X barrier.

name: Motorline MPIE5 Stainless Steel Bollards
description:
The 304 stainless steel bollards with built-in RGB LEDs are particularly useful solutions in urban areas and allow vehicle access to reserved areas such as historic sites, municipal streets and private parking lots.
With high durability, the stainless steel bollards have a twilight sensor included to activate night presence light and are prepared to work 24 hours a day, every day.
MPIE10 – Automatic folding bollard
MPIE5 – Fixed bollard
The fixed bollard MPIE5 can be indicated to also be applied between two automatic bollards MPIE10.

name: Motorline Ms01 Traffic Control Traffic Lights
description:
MS01 work traffic control lights in narrow places with double direction, for example, entrances and exits of garages, tunnels or bridges. MCS01 control board required to intigrate with trafic lights . Bord should buy separatly .
Main features: It allows to define the time that each light remains on, as well as to choose the initial color of each traffic light Operate with two or three color traffic lights Choose the polarity of the inputs (NO or NC) Power supply to the control board and traffic lights made independently, allowing the use of different voltages It has 4 operating modes: Park capacity mode: the lights alternate through detectors and is able to memorize the number of vehicles that have entered into a park, up to a maximum of 99 Timer mode: the lights alternate when they reach the set time Detector mode: the lights alternate through detectors Motorline mode: the switching of lights is controlled by an external board

Motorline Puma Automate Swing Gate Opener
Characteristics
With a consumption of just 2A, this motor minimizes environmental impact, in line with the search for energy-responsible solutions. This factor combined with strength, durability, efficiency and modern design makes the PUMA motor a superior choice in relation to other automations in the market.
Robust PerformanceAluminum structureEconomic performanceEffective for long periodsModern designHigh strength

name: Motorline Lince Automate Swing Gate Opener
description:
Lince was developed to automate swing gates, available in 230V, 110V and 24V and three different courses – 300mm, 400mm and 600mm.
As a rule, these types of motors are manufactured to be installed only on one side of the gate, with the right and left motor. With LINCE, this does not happen.
In addition to being practical, safe and powerful, this automation allows the motor to be adapted from the left side, to the right side and vice versa. For this, you only have to reverse the direction of some parts and it becomes operational for the opposite side.
In addition to being functional for the installer, it is also one of the most economical solutions we have available for automating swing gates.

name: Motorline Jag Automatic Swing Gate Opener
description:
JAG was developed to automate swing gates, available in 230V, 110V and 24V and two different courses – 400mm and 600mm.
In addition to having an irreverent design, the JAG is an extremely robust and resistant motor, with an aluminum structure and removable profiles.
Motorization and mechanical system developed for silent movement

name: Motorline Persa Automate Swing Gate Opener
description:
Persa was developed to automatic swing gates, available in 230V, 110V and 24V and with a maximum width per leaf of <3000mm.
With the same robustness as the JAG motor, the Persa stands out for being a swing motor with an underarm course, which gives it a modern design.
Extremely resistant due to its aluminum structure, it is suitable for installation in places with more adverse weather conditions.
It integrates motorization and mechanical system developed for a quieter movement.

name: Motorline Telica Automate Swing Gate Opener
description:
Simple, versatile and with a modern design, Telica is a small-sized articulated automation, with a width of only 15 cm, which allows its installation on narrow pillars, or in places with reduced space.
Developed to automate swing gates with leaves up to 2.5m each, available in 230Vac or 24Vdc.
The articulated arm allows constant regulation of impact forces and immediate detection of obstacles.
Capable of operating in environments with minimum temperatures down to -25°C, making it ideal for areas with frost and snowfall.

name: Motorline Subwing Automate Swing Gate Opener
description:
Subwing was developed to automate swing gates with leaves up to 2.5m, available in 110Vac or 230Vac, or 24Vdc.
Discreet, it is buried under the base of the leaf, making it practically invisible, without changing the appearance of the gate.
The construction of the outer box in galvanized steel provides high strength and resistance. With the possibility of applying mechanical stoppers on the automation to limit opening and closing.Discreet, it is buried under the base of the leaf, making it practically invisible, without changing the appearance of the gate.
The construction of the outer box in galvanized steel provides high strength and resistance. With the possibility of applying mechanical stoppers on the automation to limit opening and closing.

Moterline Fix Roll Up Rapid Door
Rapid door for intensive use, which self-repairs when the tarpaulin jumps out from the lateral guides. Suitable for high air pressure areas.
How it works?
When the tarpaulin hits and jumps out, the self-repair system on the way up forces the tarpaulin back into place.
Other features:
Three-phase motor with 750W of power, for intensive use
Control board with waterproof industrial box and up, down and stop button
Column photocells MF2020 that protect people and goods
External push button

name: Motorline Pile Roll Up Rapid Door
description:
Stacking rapid door developed with reinforcement struts from 50cm to 50cm, suitable for areas of high air pressure.
1500W to 5500W motor (varies depending on door size) controlled by inverter with 230Vac or 380Vac power
Control board with waterproof industrial box and up, down and stop button
External push button
For PILE doors over 10m wide, the use of a MF2020 photocell is not recommended. In these cases, two sets of photocells MF30 are applied, one inside and one outside.
This model may include anti-storm kit.

name: Motorline Spin Roll Up Rapid Door
description:
Roll-up rapid door developed with aluminum safe profile and three to six reinforcecement struts, suitable for areas with medium or high air pressure.
Three-phase motor with 750W/1500W power, for intensive use
Control board with waterproof industrial box and up, down and stop button
Column photocells MF2020 that protect people and goods
External push button
This model may include anti-storm kit.

name: Motorline Eco Roll Up Rapid Door
description:
Roll-up rapid door developed with aluminum safe profile and a reinforcement strut, suitable for areas with low air pressure.
370W three-phase motor for intensive use
Control board with up, down and stop button
Column photocells MF2020 that protect people and goods
External push button
Also get to know about the features of the ECO PLUS model and choose the most suitable rapid door for your industry.

name: Motorline Eco Plus Roll Up Rapid Door
description:
Roll-up rapid door developed with aluminum safe profile, suitable for areas with low air pressure.
Main differences between ECO rapid door
More reinforcement struts
More powerful 750W three-phase motor for intensive use
Larger safe profile, which allows installation in larger passageways
Other features:
Control board with up, down and stop button
Column photocells MF2020 that protect people and goods
External push button
A more economical solution for larger passageways.

Motorline KVM115 Motor Sectional Door Opener
The KVM105, KVM110 and KVM115 are shaft traction automations for automating sectional doors, with the possibility of horizontal or vertical application.
KVM105 – For sectional doors up to 20m²
KVM110 – For sectional doors up to 40m²
KVM115 – For sectional doors up to 50m²
Other features:
Oil dipped gearbox
Easy-to-adjust limit switch
Slowdown in opening and closing
Hoist for lifting the gate in case of power failure
Easy installation, configuration and maintenance make these automations ideal for all types of sectional doors.

name: Motorline KVM25 Motor Sectional Garage Door Opener
description:
Motor for sectional door up to 12m². Ideal for all types of vertical opening doors due to its easy installation, configuration and maintenance.
13Nm 24Vdc shaft traction motor with mechanical release for manual lifting
1 Control board MC60KVM with output for electric lock EF25
Manual motor release for opening in an emergency
Most economical solution
It is recommended to use the EF25 lock to ensure that the gate is not opened manually.

name: Moterline Rosso Pro Motor Sectional Garage Door Opener
description:
Developed for sectional doors, Rosso Pro presents 3 models for automation of doors up to 18m2. It has a modern and innovative design, that stands out in any environment.
This engine has a range of menus that offer the installer a complete management of the automation.

name: Motorline KVM205 Motor Sectional Door Opener
description:
The KVM205, KVM210 and KVM215 motors are shaft automations with a three-phase motor and electronic limit switch, for automating industrial sectional doors from 20m² to 50m², with the possibility of horizontal or vertical application.
With a frequency inverter system incorporated in the control board, it allows for smoother starts and stops and provides benefits such as: energy savings, process improvement and less mechanical maintenance.
Programming by encoder, avoiding climbs to the motor to adjust and simplifying the installation and programming process.
Other features:
Possibility of opening/closing speed adjustment
Idle intensity adjustment
No 400Vac power supply required
Competitive price
Hoist for lifting the gate in case of power failure

Motorline GALO 600 Brushless Motor Slide Gate Opener
GALO is Motorline's new brushless motor model, designed for those who need a robust and fast system for sliding gates.
Developed with the latest technology, this motor is perfect for super-intensive applications, supporting gates weighing up to 2200 kg in four different models, each adapted to different load and speed needs.
Our GALO600 SPEED motor, capable of handling gates weighing up to 600 kg, is the fastest on the market. Equipped with brushless technology, it reaches maximum speeds of 450 mm/s, depending on the gate's weight. However, when operating at the maximum permitted weight, it reaches a speed of 400 mm/s.
This speed is perfect for applications where speed is essential, such as business access points and buildings that require a more agile and efficient flow of entry and exit.
Product info
https://motorline.pt/produto/galo/
Additional Information:
Production Capacity: 5000

name: Motorline Stark Automate Sliding Residential Gate Opener
description:
Automation for large sliding gates equipped with an electronic control board with frequency inverter, allowing better management and control over the motor.
Available in three versions:
STARK4 – maximum weight up to 4000 kg
STARK6 – maximum weight up to 6000 kg
STARK8 – maximum weight up to 8000 kg
To identify the different operating phases, the STARK is equipped with two RGB LED flashing lights.
Possibility of supplying 230Vac or 400Vac, depending on the selected control board model.
Its structure is easily accessible to the installer, since all its profiles are removable.
Other Features:
Obstacle detection
Soft start and stop
Gearbox made of high quality, oil-dipped bronze
Adjustable speeds

name: Motorline Fort Automate Sliding Residential Gate Opener
description:
FORT was developed to automate sliding residential gates.
This column-shaped automation can be customized in terms of height, painting and adjustment of the pinion, transforming it into an integral element of the gate.
The new FORT-BL version offers even more power, efficiency and resistance, with a brushless motor that guarantees superior performance and a longer service life.
Other features:
Motor up to 400kg or 500Kg (on FORT-BL version) with aluminum column
Color customization
Built-in RGB flashing light
Height-adjustable pinion
Emergency unlock
Possibility to apply battery

name: Motorline Galo 2200  36V Brushless Motor Swing Gate Opener
description:
Motorline GALO2200: Heavy-Duty Industrial Sliding Gate Motor
The Motorline GALO2200 is engineered for extreme strength and continuous operation, making it the ideal solution for heavy industrial and high-traffic commercial gates weighing up to 2200 kg (2.2 tons). This robust motor is built for reliability in the most demanding environments.
Key Features & Performance
Extreme Capacity: Capable of moving very heavy gates up to 2200 kg, suitable for large industrial access points, transport depots, and corporate campuses.
High Durability: Features a heavy-duty mechanical structure and strong components designed for high usage cycles and long-term performance with minimal wear.
Safety Technology: Includes electronic anti-crushing technology that immediately detects obstacles and reverses the gate, ensuring compliance with strict safety standards.
Adjustable Speeds: Allows for custom programming of acceleration, deceleration, and running speed, providing flexibility to match specific operational requirements.
Intelligent Control Unit: Equipped with a sophisticated control board that supports various accessories, including loops, access control systems, and centralized traffic management.
Manual Override: Features a secure, keyed manual release system for quick gate opening during power outages.
Industrial facilities and manufacturing plants
Large commercial centers and warehouses
Heavy-use collective garages and high-traffic access areas

name: Pioneers in the industry, we offer Motorline Flama Automatic Fireproof Curtain from India.
description:
Flama is the first fire curtain to be produced in Portugal! It is a compact curtain with lacquered profiles, thus ensuring greater use of the passageway, without altering the aesthetics of the space.
Flama is roller curtain made of galvanized steel profiles, which in case of fire, prevents the passage of flames, controlling smoke and gases, with the possibility of interconnecting to the fire alarm system. The curtains only close when necessary, being hidden the rest of the time and making them practically invisible

name: ₹ 2,30,000/PieceGet Latest Price
description:
3-Arm turnstile with smooth, quiet and low energy consumption operation.
It has the possibility of placing sensors on both sides, so that access can be done both directions.
In the event of a power failure, the arm automatically lowers, allowing the emergency exit. It is compact and easy to install, with a 304 stainless steel structure.
Allows you to control entrances and exits using various devices (not included), such as RFID cards, fingerprints, facial recognition and bar codes.
In addition, it is compatible with any type of access control, including MCA01/02, so you can manage and control access for employees, customers or suppliers.
This type of turnstile allows you to perform access control efficiently and cost-effectively, ensuring the rapid flow of people safely.

name: Providing you the best range of Motorline GALO 600 SPEED, Automatic Sliding Glass Door and Mcs01 with effective & timely delivery.
description:
Motorline GALO600 SPEED: High-Performance Sliding Gate Motor
The Motorline GALO600 SPEED is a robust and fast sliding gate motor designed for residential and lighter commercial applications, handling gates up to 600 kg. Combining powerful performance with advanced features, this motor ensures smooth, secure, and rapid operation.
Key Features & Performance
Fast Operation: Engineered for speed, the GALO600 minimizes waiting time by providing a quicker gate movement compared to standard models.
High Capacity: Easily handles sliding gates weighing up to 600 kilograms, ensuring durability and reliable performance even with heavier gates.
Built-in Safety: Includes an integrated photocell system (optional) and electronic anti-crushing technology that immediately reverses the gate upon detecting an obstruction, guaranteeing user safety.
Soft Stop & Start: The motor features controlled acceleration and deceleration at the beginning and end of each cycle, reducing mechanical stress on the gate and the motor itself, prolonging its lifespan.
Manual Release: Equipped with a secure manual release mechanism, allowing the gate to be easily opened by hand during a power failure.
Durable Construction: Built with high-quality components designed to withstand various weather conditions and ensure long-term, low-maintenance operation.
Residential homes and large driveways
Small apartment complexes
Light industrial units and warehouses
The Motorline GALO600 SPEED offers an excellent balance of raw power and intelligent control, making it a reliable choice for automated gate security.
